description: Request hardware or software purchases easily with a detailed request form.
name: Hardware or Software Purchase Request Form

steps.title: Hardware or Software Purchase Request Form
steps.text: Please complete the fields below to request new hardware or software for your department. Providing detailed information will help us process your request promptly.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide your email address for communication regarding your request.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Enter your phone number for any necessary follow-up.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Manager/Supervisor Name
blocks.help: Enter the name of your supervisor or manager for approval.
blocks.name: supervisor

blocks.label: Type of Purchase
blocks.help: Select whether you are requesting hardware or software.
blocks.name: type

blocks.label: Product Name
blocks.help: Specify the name of the hardware or software product.
blocks.name: product_name

blocks.label: Product Description
blocks.help: Provide a brief description of the product.
blocks.name: product_description

blocks.label: Vendor Name
blocks.help: Enter the name of the vendor or supplier.
blocks.name: vendor_name

blocks.label: Vendor Contact Information
blocks.help: Provide contact details for the vendor (phone number, email, website).
blocks.name: product_contact

blocks.label: Quantity
blocks.help: Indicate the quantity of the hardware or software needed.
blocks.name: quantity

blocks.label: Cost per Unit
blocks.help: Enter the cost per unit of the product.
blocks.name: cost_per_unit

blocks.label: Justification for Purchase
blocks.help: Provide a detailed explanation of why the hardware or software is needed.
blocks.name: justification

blocks.label: Budget Code
blocks.help: Enter the budget code or account number for the purchase.
blocks.name: budget_code

blocks.label: Delivery Date Required
blocks.help: Specify the date by which the hardware or software is needed.
blocks.name: delivery_date

blocks.label: Delivery Location
blocks.help: Provide the delivery address or location where the product should be sent.
blocks.name: delivery_location

blocks.label: Additional Comments or Special Instructions
blocks.help: Optional: Include any additional comments or special instructions related to the purchase.
blocks.name: comments

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to verify the accuracy of the information provided.
blocks.name: signature
